    • 构造器详细资料

      • CharPuzGUI

        public CharPuzGUI​(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Character,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> dictionary,
                  java.lang.String[] charsets)
        Construcsts a CharPuzGUI. About the dictionary's structure, please refer to Generator.
        参数:
        dictionary - the dictionary in need
        charsets - the names of needed encodings

    • 方法详细资料

      • initDictDirectory

        public void initDictDirectory​(java.io.File initDirectory)
        Set an initial directory to find dict files. If not set, the path of the current path will be used.
        参数:
        initDirectory - the initial directory to find dict files
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3

      • setDictionary

        public void setDictionary​(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Character,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> dictionary)
        Change the use dictionary. About the dictionary's structure, please refer to Generator.
        参数:
        dictionary - the new dictionary

      • parseDictionary

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Character,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> parseDictionary​(java.io.File file,
                                                                                                                           java.lang.String charset)
                                                                                                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Tool method to parse a text dictionary (with expand name "txt").
        参数:
        file - the text dictionary file
        charset - the name of used encoding
        返回:
        the tree map dictionary use in programme
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the dictionary file wasn't found

      • parseDictionary

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Character,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> parseDictionary​(java.io.File file,
                                                                                                                           java.lang.String[] charsets)
                                                                                                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                                                                           java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Tool method to parse a text dictionary (with expand name "txt"). This method will try for several charsets until a proper encoding has found.
        参数:
        file - the text dictionary file
        charsets - the names of possible encodings
        返回:
        the tree map dictionary use in programme
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the dictionary file wasn't found
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if no proper encoding has been found

      • readDictionary

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Character,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> readDictionary​(java.io.File file)
                                                                                                                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                                                                          java.io.IOException
        Reads in a binary dictionary file (with expand name "dict" generated by this programme.
        参数:
        file - the binary dictionary file
        返回:
        the tree map dictionary use in programme
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the dictionary file wasn't found
        java.io.IOException

      • writeDictionary

        public static void writeDictionary​(java.io.File file,
                                   java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Character,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> dictionary)
                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Tool method to dump the tree map dictionary into a dict file. The dict file is a serialization of the tree map dictionary.
        参数:
        file - the target binary dictionary file
        dictionary - the dictionary to be serialized
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
